dimensional_powers.name: Dimensional Sight
dimensional_powers.description: See into an additional spatial dimension, revealing hidden objects and spaces
dimensional_powers.lore: The first lesson: reality has more corners than you can see.

dimensional_powers.name: Hypersight
dimensional_powers.description: See all sides of an object simultaneously (4D perspective on 3D objects)
dimensional_powers.lore: The cube has no hidden faces. Neither does the mind observing it.

dimensional_powers.name: Between-Glimpse
dimensional_powers.description: Briefly perceive the space between dimensions, seeing what lurks there

dimensional_powers.name: Phase Shift
dimensional_powers.description: Briefly shift partially into another dimension to pass through barriers

dimensional_powers.name: Fold Step
dimensional_powers.description: Fold space to teleport a short distance by stepping through the 4th dimension
dimensional_powers.lore: The shortest distance between two points is a fold.

dimensional_powers.name: Portal Creation
dimensional_powers.description: Create a stable portal between two locations by connecting them through higher dimensions
dimensional_powers.lore: A door is a hole in a wall. A portal is a hole in reality.

dimensional_powers.name: Between-Walk
dimensional_powers.description: Enter the space between dimensions and walk to any visible location
dimensional_powers.lore: Time does not pass in the Between. Nothing does, except you.

dimensional_powers.name: Dimensional Shunt
dimensional_powers.description: Briefly push a target partially out of phase, making them intangible and disoriented

dimensional_powers.name: Flatten Strike
dimensional_powers.description: Temporarily compress a target to 2D, dealing massive damage and immobilizing them
dimensional_powers.lore: A sphere becomes a circle. A person becomes a silhouette.

dimensional_powers.name: Dimensional Collapse
dimensional_powers.description: Begin a localized dimension reduction. EXTREMELY DANGEROUS - may spread.
dimensional_powers.lore: The Dark Forest has one law: reduce or be reduced.

dimensional_powers.name: Flat Adaptation
dimensional_powers.description: Temporarily become able to survive as a 2D being if flattened
dimensional_powers.lore: Learn to live sideways, and you can survive the collapse.

dimensional_powers.name: Anchor Reality
dimensional_powers.description: Stabilize local dimensions, preventing unwanted shifts or collapses

dimensional_powers.name: Summon from Between
dimensional_powers.description: Pull an object or entity from the space between dimensions
dimensional_powers.lore: Something always answers. Make sure you want to meet it.

dimension.name: Dimensional Magic
dimension.description: Manipulate spatial dimensions - perceive, fold, flatten, and tear reality itself
dimension.lore:
Reality is a shadow of higher truths. What you see as a solid cube, a 4D being
sees as a mere slice. Dimensional mages learn to perceive beyond their native
dimensions, fold space for travel, and - if desperate - reduce dimensions entirely.

**Building Summoning**: Advanced mages can conjure shelters (Tier 1), towers (Tier 2),
tesseracts (Tier 3), penteracts (Tier 4), and hexeracts (Tier 5). Realm pockets create
spaces bigger on the inside. These structures are folded from geometry itself.

The Nightmare Realm exists in the spaces between. Entities like the Triangle
(DO NOT SUMMON) wait for moments when the barrier thins. Every portal is a door
that swings both ways.

The ultimate weapon is dimensional collapse - reducing a region from 3D to 2D
permanently. The Dark Forest silence exists because everyone fears this deterrent.
Use it, and you may win the battle. But the collapse spreads. Always.

sources.name: Hyperspatial Energy
sources.description: Energy from the dimensions beyond normal perception

sources.name: Rift Proximity
sources.description: Power drawn from nearby dimensional rifts

sources.name: Between-Touch
sources.description: Direct connection to the space between dimensions

sources.name: Weirdness
sources.description: The anomalous energy of places where dimensions thin

channels.description: Geometric focus objects - tesseracts, Klein bottles, impossible shapes
Mental focus to perceive beyond native dimensions
Portal circles, dimensional runes, Cipher wheels
Objects from other dimensions serve as anchors

laws.name: Flatland Law
laws.description: Beings can only naturally perceive their native dimension count. Seeing more requires magic or mutation.

laws.name: Projection Law
laws.description: Higher dimensions project onto lower as shadows. A 4D cube casts a 3D shadow; a 3D sphere casts a 2D shadow.

laws.name: Weirdness Magnetism
laws.description: Dimensional anomalies attract each other. Rifts cluster. Entities find rifts.

laws.name: Conservation of Dimensionality
laws.description: Total dimensions are conserved. Reducing one area increases instability elsewhere.

laws.name: Collapse Cascade
laws.description: Once begun, dimensional collapse spreads. It can be slowed, never stopped.

laws.name: The Between Hungers
laws.description: The space between dimensions is aware. It notices those who touch it.

risks.description: Perception of higher dimensions destabilizes your sense of reality
Failed dimensional shift leaves you partially in the Between
Critical failure tears a rift that attracts Between-entities
The Triangle and its kind notice dimensional disturbances
Reality bleeds between dimensions, causing localized Weirdmageddon
Dimensional sight overload shuts down consciousness
Exposure to too many dimensions causes permanent perception changes

acquisitionMethods.description: Accidental exposure to a dimensional rift
Deal with an entity from the Between (EXTREMELY DANGEROUS)
Bond with an object from another dimension count

forbiddenCombinations.reason: Destroying space itself is the Dimensional Collapse - forbidden except in extremis

resonantCombinations.bonusEffect: Dimensional Sight - see into higher dimensions
Portal Creation - fold space for travel
Between-Summoning - call entities from the Between
Flat Adaptation - become able to survive as 2D

escalation.name: Escalation Magic
escalation.description: Mundane actions spiral into cosmic consequences; the boring becomes apocalyptic
escalation.lore:
It started with a bet about who could eat more hot dogs. It ended with a
demon king from the Hot Dog Dimension and the park on fire. Again.

In escalation realities, the universe has a sick sense of humor. Every mundane
action - every video game, every arm wrestling match, every food contest - has
a small but real chance of spiraling into cosmic conflict.

The more boring and pointless the activity, the higher the escalation potential.
Taxes are genuinely terrifying. Board games are banned in some towns.

sources.name: Mundane Energy
sources.description: The boring background radiation of everyday life

sources.name: Escalation Momentum
sources.description: Once things start spiraling, this power builds

channels.description: Bets, challenges, and trash talk accelerate escalation
Competitive spirit, boredom, or frustration fuel escalation

laws.name: Mundane Multiplier
laws.description: The more boring the starting activity, the more likely cosmic escalation

laws.name: Stakes Inflation
laws.description: Once escalation begins, stakes can only increase, never decrease

laws.name: Resolution Requirement
laws.description: Escalated situations MUST be resolved through the original mundane activity

risks.description: Cosmic entities notice and join the competition
Alternate dimension versions of the conflict merge together

acquisitionMethods.description: Survived a major escalation event and learned to see the pattern

resonantCombinations.bonusEffect: Summon dimensional champion for mundane contest

corruption_crown.name: Corruption Magic
corruption_crown.description: Power that corrupts the wielder - strength scales with lost sanity and identity
corruption_crown.lore:
The crown whispered promises of protection. Simon put it on to save
Betty from the mushroom bombs. That was 1000 years ago. Simon hasn't existed
for centuries.

Corruption magic offers power in exchange for self. The artifacts that channel
it consume their wielders' memories, relationships, even names. At full power,
you are something else entirely - powerful beyond measure, remembering nothing
of who you were.

Some say the crown's previous owners are all still in there, screaming.

sources.name: Corruption
sources.description: Dark power that grows as the wielder deteriorates

sources.name: Consumed Memories
sources.description: Power drawn from erased memories and identity

channels.description: The crown, artifact, or cursed object must be worn/held

laws.name: Power from Loss
laws.description: Every power gain costs a piece of self. No exceptions.

laws.name: Progressive Consumption
laws.description: Corruption never reverses. You can only slow it.

laws.name: Identity Replacement
laws.description: At full corruption, the artifact's persona replaces your own

risks.description: The artifact's persona temporarily takes over

acquisitionMethods.description: Put on the crown. There is no other way.
Corruption can spread from wielder to susceptible victims

resonantCombinations.bonusEffect: Ice King powers - ice constructs, snow storms (cold water magic)
Dominate weaker minds (at cost of your own)
Physical transformation toward artifact's ideal form
